cause.description:
you have seen it before "stop global warming" (Volcanos cause more pollution than humans do in a year combined. The earth goes through temperature cycles all the time) or "animal rights" (maybe we should work on how we are loosing more rights everyday in the usa) and even "legalize same sex marriage" (which is absolutely discusting and a abomination to man kind)
if you are fed up with all this Liberal, communistic thinking then join this group.
1. Stop our legislators from changing this country from the way our forefathers originally intended
2. Help people understand why they should not listen to those groups bullshit
3. defend freedom and liberty
cause.name: Stop Pointless Causes!!
